bibl.title: Family Papers from Second-Century A.D. Kellis.

author.forename: with a contribution from Colin A.

bibl.note: 7 documents discovered at Ismant el-Kharab during the 1998-9 field season in a residential sector at the eastern extremity of the site designated Area C/2, in unit C/2/5. They come, or seem likely to have come, from the papers of a single family. - Introduction: The Context (C.A.H.). - The Documents (R.S.B. and Kl.A.W.): 1. Inv. P99.2D. Census declaration, 15 August 132; - 2. Inv. P99.2A. Census declaration, 26 May - 24 June 146; - 3. Inv. P99.3A. Loan of money, 12 June 138; - 4. Inv. P99.2B. Repayment of a loan of money, July - August 145; - 5. Inv. P99.2E. Repayment of a loan of money, ca. A.D. 100-150); - 6. Inv. P99.3B. End of a contract concerning the rent / sale of a house (?), ca. A.D. 100-150; - 7. Inv. P99.2C. Tax receipt, 5 July 111.
bibl.seg: BAGNALL Roger S. and Klaas A. WORP, with a contribution from Colin A. HOPE, Family Papers from Second-Century A.D. Kellis.
ChrEg 86 (2011) Nos 171-172, pp. 228-253, 1 arbre généal., 5 figg.

7 documents discovered at Ismant el-Kharab during the 1998-9 field season in a residential sector at the eastern extremity of the site designated Area C/2, in unit C/2/5. They come, or seem likely to have come, from the papers of a single family. - Introduction: The Context (C.A.H.). - The Documents (R.S.B. and Kl.A.W.): 1. Inv. P99.2D. Census declaration, 15 August 132; - 2. Inv. P99.2A. Census declaration, 26 May - 24 June 146; - 3. Inv. P99.3A. Loan of money, 12 June 138; - 4. Inv. P99.2B. Repayment of a loan of money, July - August 145; - 5. Inv. P99.2E. Repayment of a loan of money, ca. A.D. 100-150); - 6. Inv. P99.3B. End of a contract concerning the rent / sale of a house (?), ca. A.D. 100-150; - 7. Inv. P99.2C. Tax receipt, 5 July 111.
